title: Check Even Function
text: If the function has both points (a,b) and $$(-a,b)$$, then it is an even function.

title: Check Odd Function
text: If the function has both points (a,b) and $$(-a,-b)$$, then it is an odd function.

title: Neither Case
text: If f(x) is neither even nor odd, what would it be?

title: Substitution
text: Try plugging in points that have a smalle negative number, like $$(-1,2)$$
